text: Truth Social made Trump richer and gave him a new megaphone.  But it's struggling as a social media site  —  When he's not raising horses or working at a construction site, 28-year-old Nick Mirtschink says he spends “a lot” of time on Truth Social, the social media platform started by Donald Trump.
